text: Interstate 865 (I-865) is an eastâ€“west auxiliary Interstate Highway near Indianapolis, Indiana. It is a short connector between I-65 and I-465, running for . The highway was originally numbered as a branch of I-465, but was renumbered in 2002 to prevent I-465 from intersecting with itself. It is one of the few interstates to have interchanges only at its ends. ==References== Category:Interstate Highways
title: Interstate 865
